dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Thunderstorms and hail for Astana, but Almaty's getting some perfect picnic weather this weekend.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Thunderstorms and hail for Astana, but Almaty's getting some perfect picnic weather this weekend.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Partly cloudy, with rain and thunderstorms in the morning and afternoon; hail possible in some areas. True summer in April " perfect time for a picnic or countryside trip.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Oh wow, yeah, the contrast is huge. Astana's looking at, uh, thunderstorms and possible hail on the 27th, right?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh wow, yeah, the contrast is huge. Astana's looking at, uh, thunderstorms and possible hail on the twenty seventh, right?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: April 27 " Partly cloudy, with rain and thunderstorms in the morning and afternoon; hail possible in some areas.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly—and gusts up to 15 meters per second that morning. Not exactly umbrella weather, more like… stay inside weather.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly-and gusts up to fifteen meters per second that morning. Not exactly umbrella weather, more like... stay inside weather.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Southeast wind turning southwest, 9"14 m/s with gusts up to 15 m/s.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Meanwhile, Almaty's just chilling with no rain at all, and temperatures hitting like 27 to 29 degrees on Saturday.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Meanwhile, Almaty's just chilling with no rain at all, and temperatures hitting like twenty seven to twenty nine degrees on Saturday.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: April 27 " Partly cloudy, no precipitation forecasted. Southeastern wind at 3"8 m/s. Temperature: Night +12¦+14ÂC, Day +27¦+29ÂC.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: I mean, that is just ideal. Sunny, warm, light wind… perfect for a trip out of the city.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: I mean, that is just ideal. Sunny, warm, light wind... perfect for a trip out of the city.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: True summer in April " perfect time for a picnic or countryside trip.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: But you gotta feel for anyone in Astana planning outdoor stuff—Friday's got light rain and thunderstorms in the afternoon too.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But you gotta feel for anyone in Astana planning outdoor stuff-Friday's got light rain and thunderstorms in the afternoon too.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: April 25 " Partly cloudy, light rain and thunderstorms expected in the afternoon.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: And they're warning people to take precautions, follow weather alerts… it sounds pretty serious.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And they're warning people to take precautions, follow weather alerts... it sounds pretty serious.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Possible thunderstorms " take precautions and follow weather alerts.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, hail "in some areas" is no joke. Meanwhile Almaty's forecast literally says "great day for walks and relaxation."
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, hail in some areas is no joke. Meanwhile Almaty's forecast literally says great day for walks and relaxation.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: A great day for walks and outdoor relaxation.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Almost feels like they're rubbing it in a little!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Almost feels like they're rubbing it in a little!

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Right? But hey, at least both cities are staying pretty warm—night temps in the teens, daytime mid-20s for most of it.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right? But hey, at least both cities are staying pretty warm-night temps in the teens, daytime mid-20s for most of it.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Temperature: Night +11¦+13ÂC, Day +25¦+27ÂC. Temperature: Night +12¦+14ÂC, Day +27¦+29ÂC.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: True, no one's freezing. Just a matter of whether you want sunshine or a downpour.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: True, no one's freezing. Just a matter of whether you want sunshine or a downpour.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: So if you're in Astana, maybe postpone that picnic till… I don't know, next week?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So if you're in Astana, maybe postpone that picnic till... I don't know, next week?

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Definitely. And in Almaty? Don't even think about staying indoors.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Definitely. And in Almaty? Don't even think about staying indoors.
